item.title: Review of X-Mini Capsule Happy Speakers
item.description: I received a few portable speakers as review pieces from x-mini a few days ago. I tried all of them but thought of posting a review of the most interesting model out of the lot, which is the X-mini Happy. Would also be posting a review soon of one more model that I liked quite a bit which is the X-mini Max II. In The Package The package included the following things:
